segments.text: Do I check in for the train D8 08 to Shanghai here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , show me your tickets please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here you are . By the way , when does the train leave ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The train is driving after ten minutes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's over there . Have a good trip .
segments.speaker: S2
